summary: Provides MXNet backend primitives for handling sparse tensors in graph neural network workloads, including forward and backward support for CSR‑based matrix multiplication, masking, summation, edge‑wise softmax, generalized sparse‑dense multiplication, graph‑level sparse matrix multiplication, scatter‑add accumulation, and segmented reductions, along with auxiliary helper utilities.
business_intent: To deliver high‑performance, differentiable sparse operations required by the Deep Graph Library when running on MXNet, enabling efficient training and inference of large‑scale graph neural networks.
